Text: The Turn of the Screw, originally published in 1898, is a novella written by Henry James.

1:
--------------------
<Text: The Turn of the Screw:  The story, a part of gothic and ghost story genres, first appeared in serial format in "Collier's Weekly" magazine (27 January – 16 April 1898).>

<Text: The Turn of the Screw:  In October 1898 it appeared in "The Two Magics", a book published by Macmillan in New York City and Heinemann in London.>
